tool.name: SiteMapGenerator

param.name: layer
param.dialogReference: The layer to generate overall and individual maps of the selected features.

param.name: export_location
param.dialogReference: The output location for all the generated maps and csv files.

param.name: buffer_dist
param.dialogReference: The optional buffer distance to use around the selected features. Include the measurement and the units in this field. Leave this field bank if you don't want to buffer the features and instead use the selected ones only. Example, for 100 feet, use the following: 100 Feet

param.name: title_field
param.displayname: Title Field (field in the dataset to use as document title)
param.dialogReference: This field will be used to generate a title for each of the site maps. For parcels, this field should be MAILADDR. To use this field in the mxd document, insert the Data Frame Description dynamic text.

param.name: individual
param.displayname: Include individual maps? Overall map will be exported automatically
param.dialogReference: Check this box to generate individual maps for each selected item.

tool.summary: This tool uses the selected features to generate overall and individual maps of the selected features. It also exports a csv with the selected features.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool uses the selected features to generate overall and individual maps of the selected features. It also exports a csv with the selected features.
